{{ctitle|va_end}}
{{cpp/utility/variadic/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|cstdarg}}
{{dcl|
void va_end( std::va_list ap );
}}
{{dcl end}}

The {{tt|va_end}} macro performs cleanup for an {{c|ap}} object initialized by a call to {{lc|va_start}} or {{lc|va_copy}}. {{tt|va_end}} may modify {{c|ap}} so that it is no longer usable.

If there is no corresponding call to {{lc|va_start}} or {{lc|va_copy}}, or if {{tt|va_end}} is not called before a function that calls {{lc|va_start}} or {{lc|va_copy}} returns, the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ap|an instance of the {{lc|va_list}} type to clean up}}
{{par end}}

===Expanded value===
(none)
